biotools.summary: CompAIRR is a command line tool to compare two sets of adaptive immune receptor repertoires and compute their overlap. It can also identify which sequences are present in which repertoires.

bioschemas.name: CompAIRR
bioschemas.summary: CompAIRR is a command line tool to compare two sets of adaptive immune receptor repertoires and compute their overlap. It can also identify which sequences are present in which repertoires.
